author: BBC News
description: The US president arrives in Saudi Arabia on the first leg of his trip to the Middle East and Europe.
title: Trump arrives in Saudi Arabia on first foreign tour

description: US President Donald Trump lands in Saudi Arabia on the first stop on his maiden international trip since taking office in January.
title: Under fire at home, Trump lands in Saudi Arabia

author: https://www.facebook.com/nicole.morley.50
description: Trump is the only American president to make Saudi Arabia, or any majority Muslim country, his first stop overseas.
title: Trump arrives in Saudi Arabia with Melania and Ivanka in first foreign trip

author: BBC News
description: His first foreign trip starts in Saudi Arabia amid controversy over his sacking of the FBI director.
title: Trump in Saudi Arabia: First foreign trip starts as home troubles mount

author: Patti Domm
description: President Donald Trump's visit to Saudi Arabia could be a boost for the big ambitions of Saudi Arabia's young deputy crown prince, who is trying to steer the kingdom's fortunes away from oil.
title: Trump and Saudi Arabia's millennial prince may have already mastered the art of the deal

author: By David Martosko, Us Political Editor For Dailymail.com In Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, Scott Campbell and Dave Burke For Mailonline
description: Trump flew to the Saudi capital Riyadh overnight on Air Force One - becoming the only president to make Saudi Arabia, or any majority Muslim country, his first stop abroad as president.
title: Donald Trump lands in Saudi Arabia for his first 'big foreign trip'

author: Carol E. Lee
description: President Donald Trump arrived in Saudi Arabia, his first stop outside the U.S. since taking office and the start of an ambitious nine-day trip through the Middle East and Europe.
title: Trump Begins First Foreign Trip as President in Saudi Arabia

description: Riyadh, Saudi Arabia (AP) -- Accompanying her husband on his first international trip, U.S. first lady Melania Trump on Saturday stepped off of Air Force One conservatively dressed in long sleeves and pants to conform to the strict dress code that Saudi Arabia enforces for its female citizens. But one thing was missing from her black and gold-belted ensemble: a head scarf.
title: Melania Trump Skips Headscarf as She Arrives in Saudi Arabia

author: Adam Lusher
description: Donald Trump has touched down in Saudi Arabia on the first stop on his maiden international trip since taking office in January. Saudi and Arab news channels showed footage of Trump's plane arriving in the Saudi capital Riyadh.
title: Donald Trump touches down in Saudi Arabia on his first foreign trip as US president

description: RIYADH, Saudi Arabia (AP) â€” Accompanying her husband on his first international trip, U.S. first lady Melania Trump on Saturday stepped off of Air Force One conservatively dressed in long sleeves and pants to conform to the strict dress code that Saudi Arabia enforces for its female citizens. But one thing was missing from her black and gold-belted ensemble: a head scarf. Instead, Mrs. Trump's below-the-shoulder brown hair blew freely in the breeze at King Khalid International Airport in the capital city of Riyadh.
title: Melania Trump skips headscarf as she arrives in Saudi Arabia
